item.title: 12 Tips for Improving Productivity using OneNote
item.description: OneNote is a digital notebook that automatically backs up to Microsoftâ€™s Office 365 cloud. Microsoft has developed apps for every device including Windows PC, Mac, iPhone, Android. OneNote notebooks can be shared with colleagues for real-time collaboration.

item.title: How to Automate Scheduling with Office 365
item.description: Office 365 has a Bookings app included. Use Bookings to automate and streamline your scheduling.
item.author: john.gruber@gitbit.org (John Gruber)
